price: 78. Boye akomi na boyebi ya mabombami to azuaki elaka na Ar-Rahmân?
arabic: أَطَّلَعَ ٱلۡغَيۡبَ أَمِ ٱتَّخَذَ عِندَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ عَهۡدٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: aṭṭalaʿa al-ghayba ami ittakhadha ʿinda al-raḥmāni ʿahdan
